title: Joyent SmartOS Linux Zone Escape SS Exception Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows attackers to execute arbitrary code on vulnerable installations of Joyent SmartOS. An attacker must be logged in as a user on the system in order to execute the attack.
The specific flaw exists within the handling of an SS Exception. The stack segment fault handling code allows for a GS register to be user controlled. This allows an attacker to elevate privileges to escape a Linux zone and achieve privileged execution on the global zone.
addtionnal_details: Joyent has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://help.joyent.com/entries/98788667-Security-Advisory-ZDI-CAN-3263-ZDI-CAN-3284-and-ZDI-CAN-3364-Vulnerabilities
timeline:
2015-11-04 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2016-02-18 - Coordinated public release of advisory
